title: DDFP 395: Week 6 preview & A.J. Hawk
itunes:title: DDFP 395: Week 6 preview & A.J. Hawk
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Patrick Claybon to make their Week 6 picks during the “Red Challenge Flag Picks” segment. Plus, Shek interviews A.J. Hawk about his relationship with Andy Dalton, his favorite kitchen utensil and his on-the-field beef with Maurice Jones-Drew.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
